game1.name: Click the Clown
game1.description: This is the first game I made. I simply follwed a
good tutorial that showed me how to do it. They provided
all of the images and taught me how to implement them. You
literally just try to click the clown, and he gets faster
and faster. There is no other objective.

game2.name: Green Box
game2.description: This brave little green box is tuck in a cave.
Help this poor little guy to escape from ground,
and drip lava. Use your arrow keys and space bar to direct him
